statements: UPDATE team_communication_logs SET message='Meeting rescheduled' WHERE log_id=1;
UPDATE team_communication_logs SET timestamp=NOW(), log_type='Notification' WHERE log_id=2;
UPDATE team_communication_logs SET message = 'Updated message', timestamp = '2022-08-15 10:30:00' WHERE log_id = 1;
UPDATE team_communication_logs SET log_type = 'Alert', message = 'Critical issue detected', timestamp = '2022-08-15 11:45:00' WHERE log_id = 2;
UPDATE chat_logs SET user_id = 1001 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE email_exchanges SET subject = 'Important Update' WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE chat_logs SET message = 'Hello World' WHERE user_id = 123 AND timestamp = '2022-01-01 09:00:00';
UPDATE email_exchanges SET subject = 'New Offer' WHERE recipient_email = 'john.doe@example.com';
UPDATE chat_logs SET message_text = 'Updated message text' WHERE message_id = 12345;
UPDATE team_members SET role = 'Manager' WHERE member_id = 98765;
UPDATE chat_logs SET message_text = 'Updated message text' WHERE message_id = 1;
UPDATE email_exchanges SET sender_email = 'new.sender@example.com', receiver_email = 'new.receiver@example.com', subject = 'Updated Subject' WHERE email_id = 2;
UPDATE chat_logs SET sender_name = 'Alice' WHERE receiver_name = 'Bob';
UPDATE email_exchanges SET content = 'Meeting rescheduled to 3 PM' WHERE email_id = 123;
UPDATE chat_logs SET message = 'New message content', timestamp = '2022-01-01 10:00:00' WHERE sender_name = 'Alice' AND receiver_name = 'Bob';
UPDATE team_members SET role = 'Manager', email = 'manager@example.com' WHERE member_name = 'Alice';
UPDATE chat_logs SET sender_id = 101, message = 'Hello, how are you?' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE email_logs SET subject = 'Meeting Agenda', timestamp = '2022-09-15 09:00:00' WHERE sender_id = 201;
UPDATE chat_logs SET sender_id = 1, receiver_id = 2, message = 'Hello, how are you?' WHERE id = 10
UPDATE email_logs SET body = 'This is an important email.', subject = 'Urgent: Action Required' WHERE id = 5
